column1: The Purple Pig////So I'll start off by saying that the wait was atrocious and their open seating policy for the bar is aggressive and awful and that's literally the only reason this is a 4 instead of a 5. It killed 30 minutes of my time and was just super unpleasant. Of course the aggressive guys got seats before me even though they got there after me. Also
column2: it's generally just rude to have people staring you down as you're finishing your meal. NOT a fan -- they are way too popular to have this arrangement.
